Module com.example.battleship
Package com.example.battleship.model

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
com.example.battleship.model.Ship
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
Carrier, Destroyer, Frigate, Submarine
public abstract class Ship extends javafx.scene.layout.Pane implements Serializable
Abstract class representing a Ship in the Battleship game. Contains common properties and methods for all ship types.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

      public boolean isHorizontal()
      Checks if the ship is oriented horizontally.
      Returns:
      True if horizontal, false if vertical.

    • isSunk

      public boolean isSunk()
      Checks if the ship is sunk (all segments hit).
      Returns:
